channel.title: Future Humanism
channel.description: Where AI meets human potential. Daily insights on AI, automation, and building things that matter.

item.description: ChatGPT, Claude, and Gemini are reaching similar intelligence levels. The real competition has shifted to deployment speed, cost, and user experience.

item.title: AI Just Learned to Control Your Computer: The Revolution is Here
